import {Component} from 'react' import {v4} from 'uuid' import CommentItem from '../CommentItem' import './index.css' const initialContainerBackgroundClassNames = [ 'amber', 'blue', 'orange', 'emerald', 'teal', 'red', 'light-blue', ] // Comments Starts class Comments extends Component { state = {nameInput: '', commentInput: '', commentsList: []} onChangeNameInput = event => this.setState({nameInput: event.target.value}) onChangeCommentInput = event => this.setState({commentInput: event.target.value}) onAddComment = event => { event.preventDefault() const {nameInput, commentInput} = this.state const newComment = { id: v4(), name: nameInput, comment: commentInput, isLiked: false, } this.setState(prevState => { const {commentsList} = prevState return { name: '', comment: '', commentsList: [...commentsList, newComment], } }) } render() { const {nameInput, commentInput, commentsList} = this.state return (
